description: characterization status for each planet orbiting the observed target star where 1 is full spectrum -1 partial spectrum and 0 not characterized
working angles at detection in units of mas for each planet orbiting the observed target star
Integration time for characterization in units of day

Elapsed time since mission start when observation begins in units of day
detection status for each planet orbiting the observed target star where 1 is detection 0 missed detection -1 below IWA and -2 beyond OWA
delta magnitudes at characterization for each planet orbiting the observed target star
detection SNR values for each planet orbiting the observed target star. Non-observable planets have their SNR set to 0.
characterization SNR values for each planet orbiting the observed target star. Non-observable planets have their SNR set to 0.
